message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $13,250.  This is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.  Let's work together to find a solution that works for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. That's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I'm still interested in the product.
